resources.string: The easiest way to order food from your favourite restaurant!
Book movie tickets for your family and friends!
Best discounts on every single service we offer!
HELP THE SOCIETY SO THEY CAN HELP YOU BACK
Book tickets of any transportation and travel the world!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data

Many people in our society are deprived of basic needs like clothes, books for their school-going children, etc. Several good-hearted people who are willing to donate gets indolent as they are not directly connected to NGOs at ease. Secondly, more than 20 million tons of e-waste is produced each year and it leads to e-waste pollution. The problem could be solved by an Android-based application that would bridge the gap between donors and NGOs or recyclers(in case of e-waste).This would an NGO application. The donor will login into the application. The application will provide an interface having three separate schemes: DONATE CLOTHES, DONATE BOOKS AND RECYCLE E-WASTE. Later it will collect the details of donor like his/her address, schedule and materials which are donated. Based on the data provided by the donor, NGO/recycler will arrange for the pick-up and later forward it to the needy.Thus this application aims at solving the social and environmental problems.
